title.text: RFC 6685: Expert Review for Incident Object Description Exchange Format (IODEF) Extensions in IANA XML Registry

contents.text:
Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF)                       B. Trammell
Request for Comments: 6685                                    ETH Zurich
Updates: 5070                                                  July 2012
Category: Standards Track
ISSN: 2070-1721
Expert Review for Incident Object Description Exchange Format (IODEF) Extensions in IANA XML Registry
contents.zh-CHS: IANA XML注册表中事件对象描述交换格式（IODEF）扩展的专家评审

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document specifies restrictions on additions to the subset of the IANA XML Namespace and Schema registries, to require Expert Review for extensions to Incident Object Description Exchange Format (IODEF).
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档规定了对IANA XML名称空间和模式注册表子集的添加限制，以要求专家审查事件对象描述交换格式（IODEF）的扩展。

contents.text: Status of This Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 关于下段备忘

contents.text: This is an Internet Standards Track document.
contents.zh-CHS: 这是一份互联网标准跟踪文件。

contents.text: This document is a product of the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF). It represents the consensus of the IETF community. It has received public review and has been approved for publication by the Internet Engineering Steering Group (IESG). Further information on Internet Standards is available in Section 2 of RFC 5741.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件是互联网工程任务组（IETF）的产品。它代表了IETF社区的共识。它已经接受了公众审查，并已被互联网工程指导小组（IESG）批准出版。有关互联网标准的更多信息，请参见RFC 5741第2节。

contents.text: Information about the current status of this document, any errata, and how to provide feedback on it may be obtained at http://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc6685.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关本文件当前状态、任何勘误表以及如何提供反馈的信息，请访问http://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc6685.

contents.zh-CHS: 本文件受BCP 78和IETF信托有关IETF文件的法律规定的约束(http://trustee.ietf.org/license-info)自本文件出版之日起生效。请仔细阅读这些文件，因为它们描述了您对本文件的权利和限制。从本文件中提取的代码组件必须包括信托法律条款第4.e节中所述的简化BSD许可证文本，并提供简化BSD许可证中所述的无担保。

contents.text: 1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: IODEF extensions via class extension through AdditionalData and RecordItem elements, per Section 5.2 of [RFC5070], generally register their namespaces and schemas with the IANA XML Namespace registry at http://www.iana.org/assignments/xml-registry/ns.html and the IANA XML Schema registry at http://www.iana.org/assignments/xml-registry/schema.html, respectively [RFC3688].
contents.zh-CHS: 根据[RFC5070]第5.2节，通过类扩展通过附加数据和记录项元素进行IODEF扩展，通常在以下位置向IANA XML名称空间注册表注册其名称空间和模式：http://www.iana.org/assignments/xml-registry/ns.html 以及位于http://www.iana.org/assignments/xml-registry/schema.html,分别为[RFC3688]。

contents.text: In addition to schema reviews required by IANA, these registry requests should be accompanied by a review by IODEF experts to ensure the specified AdditionalData and/or RecordItem contents are compatible with IODEF and with other existing IODEF extensions. This document specifies that review.
contents.zh-CHS: 除了IANA要求的模式审查外，这些注册表请求还应伴随IODEF专家的审查，以确保指定的附加数据和/或记录项内容与IODEF和其他现有IODEF扩展兼容。本文件规定了该审查。

contents.text: 2. Expert Review of IODEF-Related XML Registry Entries
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 专家审查与IODEF相关的XML注册表项

contents.text: Changes to the XML Schema registry for schema names beginning with "urn:ietf:params:xml:schema:iodef" are subject to an additional IODEF Expert Review [RFC5226] for IODEF correctness and appropriateness.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于以“urn:ietf:params:XML:Schema:iodef”开头的模式名称，对XML模式注册表的更改需要经过额外的iodef专家评审[RFC5226]，以确定iodef的正确性和适当性。

contents.text: The IODEF expert(s) for these reviews will be designated by the IETF Security Area Directors.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些审查的IODEF专家将由IETF安全区域主管指定。

contents.text: 3. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 安全考虑

contents.text: This document has no security considerations.
contents.zh-CHS: 此文档没有安全考虑。

contents.text: 4. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 4. IANA考虑

contents.text: This document specifies additional expert reviews for IODEF extensions, on the XML Schema registry (http://www.iana.org/assignments/xml-registry/schema.html), in Section 2.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档指定了XML模式注册表上IODEF扩展的其他专家评审(http://www.iana.org/assignments/xml-registry/schema.html)，载于第2条。

contents.text: 5. Normative References
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 规范性引用文件

contents.text: [RFC3688] Mealling, M., "The IETF XML Registry", BCP 81, RFC 3688, January 2004.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC3688]Mealling，M.“IETF XML注册表”，BCP 81，RFC 3688，2004年1月。

contents.text: [RFC5070] Danyliw, R., Meijer, J., and Y. Demchenko, "The Incident Object Description Exchange Format", RFC 5070, December 2007.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC5070]Danyliw，R.，Meijer，J.，和Y.Demchenko，“事件对象描述交换格式”，RFC 50702007年12月。

contents.text: [RFC5226] Narten, T. and H. Alvestrand, "Guidelines for Writing an IANA Considerations Section in RFCs", BCP 26, RFC 5226, May 2008.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC5226]Narten，T.和H.Alvestrand，“在RFCs中编写IANA注意事项部分的指南”，BCP 26，RFC 5226，2008年5月。
